panels.description: All active devices (reporting both valid and invalid telemetry)

targets.rawSql:
-- TODO: check if it's still correct with the 'tomorrow' box
    SELECT
        COUNT(*) total
    FROM
        device.weekly_reports_sliding w
        --inner join device.ts_device on w.report_id = device.ts_device.report_id
		INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
		INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
		INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
    WHERE
        daily_window = (SELECT MAX(daily_window) FROM device.weekly_reports_sliding)
        and device.spec.class in ($class)
        and lower(device.spec.vendor) in ($vendor)
        and device.spec.model in ($model);

/*
    SELECT
        COUNT(*) total
    FROM
        device.weekly_reports_sliding w
    WHERE
        daily_window = (SELECT MAX(daily_window) FROM device.weekly_reports_sliding);
*/

panels.title: Active Devices

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        COUNT(*) total
    FROM
        device.weekly_reports_sliding w
        --inner join device.ts_device on w.report_id = device.ts_device.report_id
		INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
		INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
		INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
    WHERE
        daily_window = (SELECT MAX(daily_window) FROM device.weekly_reports_sliding)
        and
        device.ts_device.error is NULL -- meaning there's data in the report
        and device.spec.class in ($class)
        and lower(device.spec.vendor) in ($vendor)
        and device.spec.model in ($model);
/*
-- TODO: check if it's still correct with the 'tomorrow' box
    SELECT
        COUNT(*) total
    FROM
        device.weekly_reports_sliding w
        inner join
        device.ts_device
        on w.report_id = device.ts_device.report_id
    WHERE
        daily_window = (SELECT MAX(daily_window) FROM device.weekly_reports_sliding)
        and
        device.ts_device.error is NULL; -- meaning there's data in the report
*/

panels.description: Total capacity of all active devices

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
   		sum(capacity)
    FROM
        device.weekly_reports_sliding w
        --inner join device.ts_device on w.report_id = device.ts_device.report_id
		INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
		INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
		INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
    WHERE
        daily_window = (SELECT MAX(daily_window) FROM device.weekly_reports_sliding)
        and device.spec.class in ($class)
        and lower(device.spec.vendor) in ($vendor)
        and device.spec.model in ($model);

    
/*
    SELECT
        COUNT(*) total
    FROM
        device.weekly_reports_sliding w
    WHERE
        daily_window = (SELECT MAX(daily_window) FROM device.weekly_reports_sliding);
*/

panels.title: Total Capacity

targets.rawSql:
select count(distinct(host_id))
from device.device d
inner join device.spec s
on d.spec_id = s.id
where 
s.class in ($class)
and s.vendor in ($vendor)
/*
select count(distinct(lower(model)))
from device.spec
where device.spec.class in ($class);
*/

select count(distinct(lower(model)))
from device.spec
where device.spec.class in ($class)
and device.spec.vendor in ($vendor);

SELECT
	--w.daily_window as time,
  $__timeGroup(w.daily_window, '1d', 0),
	--count(*),
	lower(device.spec.vendor) as metric,
	count(*)
FROM
	device.weekly_reports_sliding w
	INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
	INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
	INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
  where $__timeFilter(daily_window)
  --and device.spec.class = 'normal'
  and device.spec.class in ($class)
  and lower(device.spec.vendor) in ($vendor)
  and device.spec.model in ($model)
  --and device.spec.class != 'unknown'
GROUP BY
	w.daily_window, lower(device.spec.vendor)
--ORDER BY w.daily_window, lower(device.spec.vendor);
ORDER BY 2, w.daily_window;

select
  daily_window as time, 
  count(*) as "Total"
from
  device.weekly_reports_sliding w
inner join
  device.ts_device d on w.report_id = d.report_id
group by
  daily_window
order by
  daily_window;

select
  daily_window as time, 
  count(*) as "Reporting Invalid Telemetry"
from
  device.weekly_reports_sliding w
inner join
  device.ts_device d on w.report_id = d.report_id
where d.error is not NULL -- meaning there's an error and the device is not reporting correctly
group by
  daily_window
order by
  daily_window;

select
  daily_window as time, 
  count(*) as "Reporting Valid Telemetry"
from
  device.weekly_reports_sliding w
inner join
  device.ts_device d on w.report_id = d.report_id
where d.error is  NULL
group by
  daily_window
order by
  daily_window;

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(w.daily_window, '1d', 0),
	count(distinct(device.device.host_id)) as "Distinct Hosts"
FROM
	device.weekly_reports_sliding w
	INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
	INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
	INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
where $__timeFilter(daily_window)
  and device.spec.class in ($class)
  and device.spec.vendor in ($vendor)
  and device.spec.model in ($model)
  --and device.spec.type is not NULL
GROUP BY
	w.daily_window
ORDER BY w.daily_window;

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(w.daily_window, '1d', 0),
	count(distinct(device.spec.model)) as "Distinct Models"
FROM
	device.weekly_reports_sliding w
	INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
	INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
	INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
  where $__timeFilter(daily_window)
  and lower(device.spec.vendor) in ($vendor)
  and device.spec.model in ($model)
  --and device.spec.type is not NULL
GROUP BY
	w.daily_window
ORDER BY w.daily_window;

SELECT
	--w.daily_window as time,
  $__timeGroup(w.daily_window, '1d', 0),
	count(*),
	device.spec.type::TEXT as metric
FROM
	device.weekly_reports_sliding w
	INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
	INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
	INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
where $__timeFilter(daily_window)
  and device.spec.type is not NULL
  and lower(device.spec.vendor) in ($vendor)
GROUP BY
	w.daily_window, device.spec.type
ORDER BY w.daily_window;

SELECT
	--w.daily_window as time,
  $__timeGroup(w.daily_window, '1d', 0),
	device.spec.interface::TEXT as metric,
	count(*)
FROM
	device.weekly_reports_sliding w
	INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
	INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
	INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
  where $__timeFilter(daily_window)
  and
      (device.spec.type::text = 'ssd'
      or 
      device.spec.type::text = 'nvme')
  and lower(device.spec.vendor) in ($vendor)
  -- and device.spec.model in ($model)
GROUP BY
	w.daily_window, device.spec.interface
ORDER BY 2, w.daily_window;

SELECT
	--w.daily_window as time,
  $__timeGroup(w.daily_window, '1d', 0),
	count(*),
	device.spec.interface::TEXT as metric
FROM
	device.weekly_reports_sliding w
	INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
	INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
	INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
  where $__timeFilter(daily_window)
  and device.spec.type::text = 'hdd'
  and lower(device.spec.vendor) in ($vendor)
GROUP BY
	w.daily_window, device.spec.interface
ORDER BY w.daily_window;

select
  $__timeGroup(w.daily_window, '1d', 0),
	sum(capacity) as "Total Capacity" 
from
  	device.weekly_reports_sliding w
	inner join device.ts_device on w.report_id = device.ts_device.report_id
	INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
	INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
where $__timeFilter(w.daily_window)
  --and device.spec.type is not NULL
  and device.spec.class in ($class)
  and lower(device.spec.vendor) in ($vendor)
  and device.spec.model in ($model)
 group by
  daily_window
order by
  daily_window;

SELECT
  -- FIX THIS
	--w.daily_window as time,
  $__timeGroup(w.daily_window, '1d', 0),
	lower(device.spec.vendor) as metric,
	count(*)
FROM
	device.weekly_reports_sliding w
	INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
	INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
	INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
  where $__timeFilter(daily_window)
  and device.spec.class = 'hw_raid'
GROUP BY
	w.daily_window, lower(device.spec.vendor)
ORDER BY 2, w.daily_window;

SELECT
	--w.daily_window as time,
  $__timeGroup(w.daily_window, '1d', 0),
	count(*),
	device.spec.class as metric
FROM
	device.weekly_reports_sliding w
	INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
	INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
	INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
  where $__timeFilter(daily_window)
  and device.spec.class != 'unknown'
GROUP BY
	w.daily_window, device.spec.class
ORDER BY w.daily_window, device.spec.class;

SELECT
	--w.daily_window as time,
  $__timeGroup(w.daily_window, '1d', 0),
	count(*) "Empty Reports",
	device.spec.class as metric
FROM
	device.weekly_reports_sliding w
	INNER JOIN device.ts_device ON w.report_id = device.ts_device.REPORT_ID
	INNER JOIN device.device ON device.ts_device.DEVICE_ID = device.device.id
	INNER JOIN device.spec ON device.device.SPEC_ID = device.spec.id
  where $__timeFilter(daily_window)
  --and device.spec.class = 'normal'
  and device.spec.class in ($class)
  and device.ts_device.error is not NULL
GROUP BY
	w.daily_window, device.spec.class
ORDER BY w.daily_window, device.spec.class;

panels.title: Invalid Telemetry Reports by Device Class

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(time_column),
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

options.content: Learn more about Ceph telemetry

  value1

  $__timeFilter(time_column)

list.definition:
select distinct(class) from device.spec
where device.spec.class != 'unknown';
list.label: class
list.name: class
list.query:
select distinct(class) from device.spec
where device.spec.class != 'unknown';

list.definition:
select distinct(lower(vendor)) from device.spec
where device.spec.class in ($class);
list.label: vendor
list.name: vendor
list.query:
select distinct(lower(vendor)) from device.spec
where device.spec.class in ($class);
